case_vignette: A 79-year-old white man with an extensive history of nonmelanoma skin cancer presents for a routine skin examination. During his visit, he asks to have a groin rash checked. For 1 to 2 years, he has been using over-the-counter and prescription antifungal and antibiotic creams for a presumed “jock itch.” Recently, he has developed more discomfort and reports episodic, profuse bleeding from the area. Examination reveals a large erythematous, eroded plaque on the posterior right scrotum extending anteriorly to the right upper thigh. A nodule is present within the plaque. The left scrotum is minimally involved, and there is no adenopathy. The patient is otherwise healthy and has no significant medical history. He is a nonsmoker and has no history of alcohol abuse. He has a history of hypertension, which is well-controlled with medication. He has been taking his medications as prescribed and has no known allergies. He has a family history of skin cancer and has been taking a daily multivitamin for the least 5 years. He has been using sunscreen regularly for the past 20 years. He has a history of sunburns, but they are not severe. He has been using over-the-counter and prescription antifungal and antibiotic creams for the past 1 to 2 years. He has been using a topical corticosteroid cream for the past 6 months. He has been using a topical retinoid cream for the past 6 months. He has been using a topical retinoid cream for the past 6 months. He has been using a topical retinoid cream for the past 6 months. He has been using a topical retinoid cream for the past 6 months. He has been using a topical retinoid cream for the past 6 months. He has been using a topical retinoid cream for the past 6 months. He has been using a topical retinoid cream for the past 6 months. He has been using a topical retinoid cream for the past 6 months. He has been using a topical retinoid cream for the past 6 months. He has been using a topical retinoid cream for the past 6 months. He has been using a topical retinoid cream for the past 6 months. He has been using a topical retinoid cream for the past 6 months.
